channel.title: Probably an easy question
channel.description:
I know aboslutely nothing about java, but i wanna try to learn.
So i downloaded RSCD source, and i wanna try to code and make some of my own stuff
I open it up, and realize idk how to even start..
So my question is, what program do i use, or how do i actually start editing the source and adding my own things?
Thanks :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 10:56:27 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for double post, but i figured out how to edit it. You just change the text in RSCD notepad file.
But the problem is, when i press compile or click on the executable java file it doesn't work.
Anyone know anything about this?

item.title: Probably an easy question
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

First of you will need Wamp, JDK & Apache Ant. Google them and download & install, If you want any help on anything, u can add me on msn if you like, be happy to get you on your feet, Pm me your msn.

Read full topic
